text: int main ( ) { int * * o , max ; int t , r , x , i , j , s ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { max = - 9999 ; scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; o = ( int * * ) malloc ( ( r + 1 ) * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i <= r ; i ++ ) { s = ( r + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ; o [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( s ) ; memset ( o [ i ] , 0 , s ) ; } for ( i = 1 ; i <= r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & x ) ; o [ i ] [ j ] = x + ( o [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] > o [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ? o [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] : o [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( j = 0 ; j <= r ; j ++ ) { if ( o [ r ] [ j ] > max ) max = o [ r ] [ j ] ; } for ( i = 0 ; i <= r ; i ++ ) free ( o [ i ] ) ; free ( o ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } }
